name: Rosemary Traill
what_you_do: The Responsible Investment Association Australasia (RIAA) focuses on promoting responsible and ethical investment practices across Australia and New Zealand.
who_you_serve: RIAA serves a diverse audience including super funds, KiwiSaver providers, fund managers, banks, consultants, researchers, brokers, impact investors, property managers, trusts, foundations, faith-based groups, financial advisers, and individuals.
current_projects: RIAA Conference Australia 2026 on 27 & 28 May in Melbourne or online.
social_proof: Largest network of responsible and impact investors in AU & NZ with 500+ members representing A$76 trillion / NZ$83 trillion in assets under management.
bio: Largest network of responsible and impact investors in AU & NZ with 500+ members representing A$76 trillion / NZ$83 trillion in assets under management.
business_focus: The Responsible Investment Association Australasia (RIAA) focuses on promoting responsible and ethical investment practices across Australia and New Zealand.
